categories.name: Wallet Market Data
categories.description: These tools return market prices and data used by the Wallet/Broker service, not Pro Trading prices. For Pro Trading market data, see the Pro Trading Tools section.

tools.name: market_get_ticker
tools.description: Get Wallet exchange rates for cryptocurrencies in a specific quote symbol and date. Returns the price of one unit of the base symbol in the requested quote symbol (default: USD) as used by the Wallet/Broker service. Optional base_symbol filter and date for historical rates. Response is a list of prices.

base_symbol.description: Filter by specific base symbol (e.g., BTC)

date.description: Timestamp or date string (ISO 8601) for historical rates

base_symbol.description: Base cryptocurrency symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH)

quote_symbol.description: Quote currency symbol in uppercase (e.g., EUR, USD)

date.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the rate was recorded

price.description: Price of one unit of base_symbol in quote_symbol (as string for precision)

tools.name: market_get_data
tools.description: Gets current Wallet price, 24h volume, market highs and lows for a cryptocurrency. These prices are used by the Wallet/Broker service (not Pro Trading). Specify base_symbol (e.g., BTC) and optional quote_symbol (default: EUR). Returns price, volume, market cap, and supply information. Response is a single object.

base_symbol.description: Base symbol (e.g., BTC, ETH, DOGE, SOL)
Base cryptocurrency symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH)

quote_symbol.description: Quote currency symbol in uppercase (e.g., EUR, USD)

date.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the data was recorded

price.description: Current price of base_symbol in quote_symbol (as string for precision)

market_cap.description: Total market capitalization in quote_symbol (as string for precision)

volume_24h.description: 24-hour trading volume in quote_symbol (as string for precision)

max_supply.description: Maximum supply of the cryptocurrency (as string, nullable)

total_supply.description: Total current supply of the cryptocurrency (as string, nullable)

tools.name: market_get_chart
tools.description: Gets Wallet price history (candles/chart) with date and price in the quote symbol. These prices reflect the Wallet/Broker service, not Pro Trading. Requires pair (e.g., BTC-USD) and timeframe (one-hour, one-day, one-week, one-month, one-year). Returns data points with ISO 8601 date/time and price in the quote symbol from the pair.

date.description: ISO 8601 date/time for this data point

price.description: Price at this point in time in the quote symbol from the pair (as string for precision)

tools.name: market_get_assets_details
tools.description: Gets detailed information of assets (cryptocurrencies and fiat) supported by Bit2Me Wallet. If symbol is provided, returns details for that specific asset. If symbol is not provided, returns all available assets. Returns symbol, name, type, network (lowercase), trading status, loan availability, and pro_trading_pairs (complete trading pairs in BASE-QUOTE format, e.g., BTC-EUR). Use this to discover available symbols or verify if a specific asset is tradeable or loanable before operations.

symbol.description: Filter by specific asset symbol (e.g., BTC, ETH). If not provided, returns all assets.
Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

name.description: Human-readable pocket name or currency name

type.description: Order type: "limit" executes at specified price or better, "market" executes immediately at best available price, "stop-limit" triggers when stop price is reached

network.description: Blockchain network name in lowercase (e.g., bitcoin, ethereum, binance_smart_chain)

enabled.description: Whether the asset is enabled for use

tradeable.description: Whether the asset can be traded

loanable.description: Whether the asset can be used as collateral for loans

pro_trading_pairs.description: List of complete trading pairs available for Pro Trading in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-EUR, BTC-USD)

tools.name: wallet_get_pockets
tools.description: Gets balances, UUIDs, and available funds from Simple Wallet (Broker). Does not include Pro/Earn balance. Returns all pockets of the user. IMPORTANT: Users often have MULTIPLE pockets for the same symbol (e.g. multiple EUR pockets). ALWAYS check ALL pockets for a specific symbol to find the one with a positive balance.

symbol.description: Filter by cryptocurrency or fiat symbol (e.g., BTC, EUR)
Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

balance.description: Current balance as string for precision

available.description: Available balance as string for precision

name.description: Human-readable pocket name or currency name

tools.name: wallet_get_pocket_details
tools.description: Gets detailed information of a specific wallet (Pocket) by its ID. Returns balance, available funds, blocked funds, symbol, name, and creation date. Use wallet_get_pockets first to get the pocket ID.

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

balance.description: Current balance as string for precision

available.description: Available balance as string for precision

blocked.description: Blocked balance as string for precision

name.description: Human-readable pocket name or currency name

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: wallet_get_pocket_addresses
tools.description: Lists deposit addresses for a wallet (Pocket) on a specific network. Use wallet_get_networks first to see available networks for a currency. Each network may have different addresses. Returns address, network, and creation date. Use this address to receive deposits on the specified network.

address.description: Blockchain address for receiving deposits on the specified network

network.description: Blockchain network for deposits/withdrawals (e.g., bitcoin, ethereum, polygon)

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: wallet_get_networks
tools.description: Lists available networks for a specific currency. Use this before wallet_get_pocket_addresses to see which networks support deposits for a currency (e.g., bitcoin, ethereum, binanceSmartChain). Returns network ID, name, native currency, fee currency, and whether it requires a tag/memo.

symbol.description: Cryptocurrency symbol (e.g., BTC, ETH)

name.description: Human-readable pocket name or currency name

has_tag.description: If true, deposits require a memo/tag in addition to the address (common for XRP, XLM)

tools.name: wallet_get_cards
tools.description: List credit/debit cards registered in Bit2Me. Returns card details including card ID, brand, last 4 digits, expiration date, holder name, verification status, and alias. Optional card_id filter to retrieve a specific card. Use limit and offset for pagination. Use this to get card_id for wallet_buy_crypto_with_card.

card_id.description: Card UUID to retrieve details for a specific card (optional, if not specified returns all cards)

limit.description: Maximum number of cards to return (default: 10, max: 150)

offset.description: Number of cards to skip for pagination (default: 0)

card_id.description: Unique identifier for the payment card

user_id.description: User identifier who owns the wallet

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

holder.description: Cardholder name as it appears on the card

last4.description: Last 4 digits of the card number for identification

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

verified.description: true if the card has been verified for payments

invalid.description: true if the card has been marked as invalid or expired

tools.name: wallet_get_movements
tools.description: History of past Wallet operations. Optional symbol filter. Use limit and offset for pagination (default limit: 10). Returns movement list with type (deposit, withdrawal, swap, purchase, transfer, fee, other), amount, symbol, status, and date. Response is a paginated list with metadata.

symbol.description: Filter by cryptocurrency or fiat symbol (e.g., BTC, EUR)

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

tools.name: wallet_get_movement_details
tools.description: Gets detailed information of a specific movement by its ID. Returns complete movement data including type (deposit, withdrawal, swap, purchase, transfer, fee, other), amount, currency, status, fees, timestamps, and related pocket IDs. Use wallet_get_movements first to get movement IDs.

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

tools.name: wallet_buy_crypto
tools.description: STEP 1: Buy cryptocurrency using fiat balance from a pocket. Creates a proforma quote. Use wallet_get_pockets to find pocket IDs. REQUIRES subsequent confirmation with wallet_confirm_operation.

origin_pocket_id.description: Source pocket UUID containing fiat currency (e.g., EUR pocket)

destination_pocket_id.description: Target pocket UUID to receive cryptocurrency (e.g., BTC pocket)

amount.description: Amount to spend from origin pocket (in origin currency)

rate.description: Exchange rate as string for precision

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource expires

tools.name: wallet_sell_crypto
tools.description: STEP 1: Sell cryptocurrency to receive fiat balance in a pocket. Creates a proforma quote. Use wallet_get_pockets to find pocket IDs. REQUIRES subsequent confirmation with wallet_confirm_operation.

origin_pocket_id.description: Source pocket UUID containing cryptocurrency (e.g., BTC pocket)

destination_pocket_id.description: Target pocket UUID to receive fiat currency (e.g., EUR pocket)

amount.description: Amount to sell from origin pocket (in origin cryptocurrency)

rate.description: Exchange rate as string for precision

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource expires

tools.name: wallet_swap_crypto
tools.description: STEP 1: Swap/exchange one cryptocurrency for another between pockets. Creates a proforma quote. Use wallet_get_pockets to find pocket IDs. REQUIRES subsequent confirmation with wallet_confirm_operation.

origin_pocket_id.description: Source pocket UUID containing cryptocurrency to swap (e.g., BTC pocket)

destination_pocket_id.description: Target pocket UUID to receive different cryptocurrency (e.g., ETH pocket)

amount.description: Amount to swap from origin pocket (in origin cryptocurrency)

rate.description: Exchange rate as string for precision

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource expires

tools.name: wallet_buy_crypto_with_card
tools.description: STEP 1: Buy cryptocurrency using a credit card. Creates a proforma quote. REQUIRES subsequent confirmation with wallet_confirm_operation.

card_id.description: Credit card ID registered in Bit2Me

destination_pocket_id.description: Target pocket UUID to receive cryptocurrency (e.g., BTC pocket)

amount.description: Amount to charge to the card (in fiat currency)

currency.description: Fiat currency of the amount (e.g., EUR, USD)

rate.description: Exchange rate as string for precision

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource expires

tools.name: wallet_confirm_operation
tools.description: STEP 2: Confirms and executes a previously created proforma from wallet_buy_crypto, wallet_sell_crypto, wallet_swap_crypto, or wallet_buy_crypto_with_card. Final action.

tools.name: pro_get_balance
tools.description: Gets balances from PRO Trading account. This is separate from Simple Wallet - funds must be transferred using pro_deposit/pro_withdraw. Returns available and blocked balances per symbol for trading.

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

balance.description: Current balance as string for precision

available.description: Available balance as string for precision

tools.name: pro_get_open_orders
tools.description: View open trading orders in PRO. Returns all active orders (pending, partially filled). Optional pair filter to see orders for a specific market. Use this to monitor order status after pro_create_order.

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

side.description: Order direction: "buy" to purchase base currency, "sell" to dispose base currency

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

price.description: Order price in quote currency (as string for precision). For limit orders, this is the target price

filled_amount.description: Amount of the order that has been executed (as string for precision)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: pro_get_trades
tools.description: Gets the user's trade history in Pro Trading. Returns executed trades with price, amount, side (buy/sell), fees, and date. Optional filters: trading pair, side, order type, date range, limit (max 50), offset, and sort order. Use this to review past trading activity. Response is a paginated list with metadata.

order_type.description: Filter by order type (limit, stop-limit, market)

limit.description: Maximum number of trades to fetch (max 50, default 50)

offset.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

start_time.description: Filter trades from this date (ISO 8601 format)

end_time.description: Filter trades until this date (ISO 8601 format)

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

price.description: Order price in quote currency (as string for precision). For limit orders, this is the target price

side.description: Order direction: "buy" to purchase base currency, "sell" to dispose base currency

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

cost.description: Total cost of executed trades in quote currency (price Ã— filled_amount)

is_maker.description: true if the order added liquidity (maker), false if it removed liquidity (taker). Makers typically get lower fees

tools.name: pro_get_order_trades
tools.description: Gets all individual trades (executions) associated with a specific order. Returns detailed execution data including price, amount, fees, and date for each fill. Useful for analyzing how a large order was executed across multiple trades.

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

price.description: Order price in quote currency (as string for precision). For limit orders, this is the target price

fee.description: Fee amount as string for precision

tools.name: pro_get_order_details
tools.description: Gets detailed information of a specific Pro order. Returns order type, trading pair, side, amount, price, status, filled amount, creation time, and execution details. Use pro_get_open_orders or pro_get_trades first to get the order ID.

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

side.description: Order direction: "buy" to purchase base currency, "sell" to dispose base currency

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

price.description: Order price in quote currency (as string for precision). For limit orders, this is the target price

filled_amount.description: Amount of the order that has been executed (as string for precision)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: pro_create_order
tools.description: Create Limit/Market/Stop order in PRO Trading. Returns order ID. For Limit orders, 'price' is required. For Stop-Limit orders, both 'price' and 'stop_price' are required. Market orders execute immediately at current price. Use pro_get_open_orders to check order status.

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

side.description: Order direction: "buy" to purchase base currency, "sell" to dispose base currency

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

price.description: Order price in quote currency (as string for precision). For limit orders, this is the target price

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: pro_cancel_order
tools.description: Cancel a specific PRO order by ID. Only open/pending orders can be cancelled. Returns cancellation status. Use pro_get_open_orders first to see which orders can be cancelled.

tools.name: pro_cancel_all_orders
tools.description: Cancel all open orders in Pro Trading. Optional pair filter to cancel only orders for a specific market. Returns count of cancelled orders. Use with caution as this affects all pending orders.

tools.name: pro_deposit
tools.description: Deposit funds from Simple Wallet to Pro Trading account. Funds must be available in Simple Wallet first (check with wallet_get_pockets). Transfer is immediate. Use pro_get_balance to verify the deposit.

symbol.description: Symbol - can be cryptocurrency or fiat (e.g., BTC, EUR)
Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

tools.name: pro_withdraw
tools.description: Withdraw funds from Pro Trading account back to Simple Wallet. Funds must be available in Pro Trading (check with pro_get_balance). Transfer is immediate. Use wallet_get_pockets to verify the withdrawal.

symbol.description: Symbol - can be cryptocurrency or fiat (e.g., BTC, EUR)

to_pocket_id.description: Destination pocket UUID in Simple Wallet (optional)

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

tools.name: pro_get_market_config
tools.description: Gets market configuration including precision (decimal places), minimum/maximum amounts, and trading status. Optional pair filter for a specific market. Use this before placing orders to ensure amounts meet requirements. Response is a list of configurations.

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

min_amount.description: Minimum order amount allowed in base currency

max_amount.description: Maximum order amount allowed in base currency

tools.name: pro_get_order_book
tools.description: Gets the order book (market depth) for a market showing current buy and sell orders. Requires trading pair (e.g., BTC-USD). Returns bids (buy orders) and asks (sell orders) with prices and amounts. Useful for analyzing market liquidity and determining optimal order prices. Response is a single object.

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

bids.description: Array of buy orders sorted by price (highest first). Each bid represents demand at that price level

asks.description: Array of sell orders sorted by price (lowest first). Each ask represents supply at that price level

tools.name: pro_get_public_trades
tools.description: Gets the latest public trades (executed orders) for a market. Requires trading pair (e.g., BTC-USD). Returns recent transactions with price, amount, side (buy/sell), and date. Optional limit (max 100) and sort order (ASC/DESC). Useful for seeing recent market activity. Response is a list of trades with metadata.

pair.description: Trading pair in BASE-QUOTE format (e.g., BTC-USD)

price.description: Order price in quote currency (as string for precision). For limit orders, this is the target price

side.description: Order direction: "buy" to purchase base currency, "sell" to dispose base currency

tools.name: pro_get_candles
tools.description: Gets OHLCV (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) candles for Trading Pro. Requires trading pair (e.g., BTC-USD) and timeframe. Returns price data in specified timeframe (1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 4h, 1d, 1w, 1M) with timestamp and date. Optional limit to control number of candles. Essential for technical analysis and charting. Response is a list of candles with metadata.

open.description: Opening price at the start of the time period

high.description: Highest price reached during the time period

low.description: Lowest price reached during the time period

close.description: Closing price at the end of the time period

volume.description: Total trading volume during the time period in base currency

tools.name: earn_get_summary
tools.description: View summary of accumulated rewards in Staking/Earn. Returns total rewards earned across all Earn wallets, breakdown by symbol, and overall performance. Use this to see your total staking rewards.

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

tools.name: earn_get_wallets
tools.description: List active Earn wallets/strategies. Returns wallet ID, symbol, balance, strategy, and status. Use earn_get_apy to get APY rates for each symbol.

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

balance.description: Current balance as string for precision

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: earn_get_wallet_details
tools.description: Get detailed information of a specific Earn wallet. Returns balance, strategy, status, and configuration. Use earn_get_wallets first to get the wallet ID. Use earn_get_apy to get APY rates.

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

balance.description: Current balance as string for precision

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: earn_get_wallet_movements
tools.description: Get movement history of a specific Earn wallet. Returns movements with type (deposit, withdrawal, reward, fee), amounts, dates, and status. Optional limit and offset for pagination. Use earn_get_wallets first to get the wallet ID. Response is a paginated list with metadata.

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

wallet_id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) for the Earn wallet

tools.name: earn_get_movements
tools.description: Get movement history across all Earn wallets. Returns movements with type (deposit, reward, withdrawal, discount-funds, discount-rewards, fee), amounts, dates, rates, source, and issuer information. Supports filtering by symbol, wallet, type (deposit, reward, withdrawal, discount-funds, discount-rewards), date range, and pagination. All parameters are optional. Response is a paginated list with metadata.

symbol.description: Filter by specific symbol

type.description: Filter by movement type. Valid values: deposit, reward, withdrawal, discount-funds, discount-rewards
Type of the resource or operation

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

wallet_id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) for the Earn wallet

rate.description: Exchange rate as string for precision

tools.name: earn_get_movements_summary
tools.description: Get summary statistics of Earn movements filtered by type. Valid type values: deposit, reward, withdrawal, discount-funds, discount-rewards. Returns total count, total amounts, and aggregated data for the specified movement type across all Earn wallets.

type.description: Movement type. Valid values: deposit, reward, withdrawal, discount-funds, discount-rewards
Type of the resource or operation

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

tools.name: earn_get_assets
tools.description: Get list of assets (cryptocurrencies) supported in Earn/Staking. Returns list of cryptocurrency symbols with their staking options. Use this to discover which assets can be staked before creating Earn deposits.

tools.name: earn_get_apy
tools.description: Get current APY (Annual Percentage Yield) rates for all Earn/Staking options. Returns yield rates per asset. Use this to compare returns before choosing where to stake your assets. IMPORTANT: All yield values are ratios where 1.0 equals 100% (e.g., 0.05 = 5% yield).

symbol.description: Filter by specific currency symbol (e.g., BTC). If omitted, returns all.

tools.name: earn_get_rewards_config
tools.description: Get global rewards configuration for Earn/Staking. Returns wallet rewards configuration including wallet_id, user_id, symbol, lock_period_id, reward_symbol, and timestamps. Use this to understand reward configuration for all wallets.

wallet_id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) for the Earn wallet

user_id.description: User identifier who owns the wallet

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

lock_period_id.description: Identifier for the staking lock period configuration

reward_symbol.description: Currency symbol in which staking rewards are paid

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was last updated

tools.name: earn_get_wallet_rewards_config
tools.description: Get rewards configuration for a specific Earn wallet. Returns reward calculation rules, APY details, and wallet-specific staking parameters. Use earn_get_wallets first to get the wallet ID.

wallet_id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) for the Earn wallet

user_id.description: User identifier who owns the wallet

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

lock_period_id.description: Identifier for the staking lock period configuration

reward_symbol.description: Currency symbol in which staking rewards are paid

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was last updated

tools.name: earn_get_wallet_rewards_summary
tools.description: Get rewards summary for a specific Earn wallet. Returns reward symbol, reward amount, and converted reward amount in fiat currency. Use earn_get_wallets first to get the wallet ID. Optional user_currency parameter to specify the fiat currency for conversion (default: EUR).

user_currency.description: Fiat currency for conversion (e.g., EUR, USD). Optional, defaults to EUR.

reward_symbol.description: Currency symbol in which staking rewards are paid

reward_amount.description: Total accumulated rewards amount (as string for precision)

tools.name: earn_deposit
tools.description: Deposit funds from Simple Wallet pocket to Earn (Staking). Funds will start earning rewards based on the asset's APY. Returns operation details with type: deposit. Use wallet_get_pockets to find your pocket ID and earn_get_wallets to see available Earn strategies.

pocket_id.description: Source pocket UUID from Simple Wallet

symbol.description: Cryptocurrency symbol (e.g., BTC, ETH)

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

tools.name: earn_withdraw
tools.description: Withdraw funds from Earn (Staking) back to Simple Wallet pocket. Funds will stop earning rewards after withdrawal. Returns operation details with type: withdrawal. Use earn_get_wallets to check your Earn balance.

pocket_id.description: Destination pocket UUID in Simple Wallet

symbol.description: Cryptocurrency symbol (e.g., BTC, ETH)

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

tools.name: loan_get_simulation
tools.description: Simulate a loan scenario to calculate LTV (Loan To Value) ratio and APR. LTV represents the loan amount as a ratio of the guarantee value (1.0 = 100%). Lower LTV means lower risk. Provide either guarantee_amount or loan_amount (the other will be calculated). Requires guarantee_symbol (crypto), loan_symbol (any currency like USDC, EURC), and user_symbol (fiat like EUR). Returns guarantee and loan amounts (original and converted), LTV ratio, APR, and user currency. Use this before loan_create to plan your loan.

loan_symbol.description: Loan currency symbol (e.g., USDC, EURC, EUR). Can be any supported currency.

guarantee_amount.description: Guarantee amount (optional if loan_amount is given)

loan_amount.description: Loan amount (optional if guarantee_amount is given)

guarantee_symbol.description: Cryptocurrency symbol used as collateral (e.g., BTC, ETH)

guarantee_amount.description: Amount of collateral deposited (as string for precision)

loan_symbol.description: Currency symbol in which the loan is denominated (e.g., USDC, EUR)

loan_amount.description: Principal loan amount (as string for precision)

tools.name: loan_get_config
tools.description: Get currency configuration for loans. Returns two separate arrays: guarantee_currencies (cryptocurrencies that can be used as collateral with LTV limits) and loan_currencies (currencies available for borrowing with APR, liquidity, and min/max amounts). Use guarantee currencies as collateral to receive loan currencies. Use this before creating a loan to understand available options and limits.

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was last updated

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was last updated

tools.name: loan_get_movements
tools.description: Get loan movement history. Returns movements with type (payment, interest, guarantee_change, liquidation, other), amounts, dates, and status. Optional order_id filter to see movements for a specific loan. Use limit and offset for pagination. Response is a paginated list with metadata.

type.description: Type of the resource or operation

symbol.description: Asset symbol in uppercase (e.g., BTC, ETH, EUR)

tools.name: loan_get_orders
tools.description: Get all loan orders (both active and closed) for the user. Returns basic loan information: id, status, guarantee and loan amounts, symbols, and creation date. Use loan_get_order_details for complete information including LTV, APR, and liquidation price. Optional limit and offset for pagination.

guarantee_symbol.description: Cryptocurrency symbol used as collateral (e.g., BTC, ETH)

guarantee_amount.description: Amount of collateral deposited (as string for precision)

loan_symbol.description: Currency symbol in which the loan is denominated (e.g., USDC, EUR)

loan_amount.description: Principal loan amount (as string for precision)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: loan_get_order_details
tools.description: Get detailed information of a specific loan order. Returns complete loan details including guarantee amount, loan amount, remaining amount, LTV, APR, liquidation price, status, creation date, expiration date, and APR details. Use loan_get_orders first to get the order ID.

guarantee_symbol.description: Cryptocurrency symbol used as collateral (e.g., BTC, ETH)

guarantee_amount.description: Amount of collateral deposited (as string for precision)

loan_symbol.description: Currency symbol in which the loan is denominated (e.g., USDC, EUR)

loan_amount.description: Principal loan amount (as string for precision)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource expires

tools.name: loan_create
tools.description: Create a new loan by providing cryptocurrency as guarantee (collateral) to receive loan currency (can be any supported currency like USDC, EURC, or fiat). The guarantee amount determines the maximum loan amount based on LTV (Loan To Value) ratio. Use loan_get_simulation first to calculate optimal amounts. Returns loan order details with status.

loan_symbol.description: Loan currency symbol (e.g., USDC, EURC, EUR). Can be any supported currency.

guarantee_symbol.description: Cryptocurrency symbol used as collateral (e.g., BTC, ETH)

guarantee_amount.description: Amount of collateral deposited (as string for precision)

loan_symbol.description: Currency symbol in which the loan is denominated (e.g., USDC, EUR)

loan_amount.description: Principal loan amount (as string for precision)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: loan_increase_guarantee
tools.description: Increase the guarantee (collateral) amount for an existing loan. This improves the LTV ratio and reduces risk. Returns updated loan details. Use loan_get_orders first to get the order ID.

guarantee_amount.description: Amount of collateral deposited (as string for precision)

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was last updated

tools.name: loan_payback
tools.description: Pay back (return) part or all of a loan. Reduces the loan amount and may release guarantee if fully paid. Returns updated loan details. Use loan_get_orders first to get the order ID, or loan_get_order_details to check current loan amount.

tools.name: account_get_info
tools.description: View user account information including profile details, verification levels, account status, and user settings. Returns account metadata useful for understanding account capabilities and restrictions.

user_id.description: User identifier who owns the wallet

created_at.description: ISO 8601 date/time when the resource was created

tools.name: portfolio_get_valuation
tools.description: Calculates the total portfolio value by aggregating all assets across Wallet, Pro Trading, Earn/Staking, and Loans. Converts all holdings to the specified fiat symbol (default: EUR) using current market prices. Returns total value, breakdown by asset, and individual asset valuations. Filters out dust amounts below minimum threshold.

quote_symbol.description: Quote currency symbol in uppercase (e.g., EUR, USD)
